description: Poise provides discreet protection against bladder leakage with 3in1 protection that a period pad can't provide.PoiseThin & Discreet Ultra Long Pads have been specifically designed for bladder leaks, with superior 3-in-1 dryness, comfort and odour control which a period pad can’t provide!They offer moderate bladder protection commonly experienced when bending, lifting or exercising. You've got Poise to keep you feeling feminine, confident and in control.Incredibly Thin & Dry UltraLite™5 layerabsorbent core is 45% thinner than POISE Extra Plus Pads, you’ll barely know it’s thereRapid-Dry CoverAll day comfort Thin-Flex core designed to holditsshape all day without scrunching, bunching, twisting or curlingHelps eliminateodour For utmost disrcetionUltimate protection Leak-Block side shields for outstanding protectionSuitable for overnight use  With a longer and more absorbent coreIndividually wrapped Hygienic & discreet
name: Poise Thin & Discreet Ultra Long Pads 8 Pack
